Package com.abdcelik

Class MenuDriven<E extends com.SearchTree.SearchTree<Software>>

java.lang.Object
com.abdcelik.MenuDriven<E>
Type Parameters:
E - generic type of storing data
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuDrivenInterface
public class MenuDriven<E extends com.SearchTree.SearchTree<Software>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuDrivenInterface
Manages a software store. Generic type must be implements SearchTree interface.

  • Method Details

    • addSoftware

      private boolean addSoftware​(Software item)
      Adds a software to the system. It's not a public feature. Administrator can add only.
      Parameters:
      item - item to be added
      Returns:
      true if item can be added. Otherwise false

    • removeSoftware

      private boolean removeSoftware​(Software item)
      Removes a software from the system. It's not a public feature. Administrator can remove only.
      Parameters:
      item - item to be removed
      Returns:
      true if item can be removed. Otherwise false

    • updateSoftware

      private boolean updateSoftware​(Software oldItem, Software newItem)
      Updates existing software. It's not a public feature. Administrator can update only.
      Parameters:
      oldItem - old item to be updated
      newItem - new item
      Returns:
      true if item can be updated. Otherwise false
